title: Frontend Developer
description: Builds the user-facing part of websites and web applications using modern technologies.

title: Product Manager
description: Guides the success of a product and leads the cross-functional team that is responsible for improving it.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manages cloud infrastructure and automates deployment pipelines for our growing platform.

title: Data Analyst
description: Collects, cleans, and interprets data sets in order to answer a question or solve a problem.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Works on both the front-end and back-end of an application, from database to UI.

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Creates user-friendly interfaces that enable users to understand how to use complex technical products.
